label: ham
to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Debian install with Software Speech?
body: Thirdly, They must not raise taxes on the property of the people, without the consent of the people, given by themselves, or their deputies. And this properly concerns only such governments where the legislative is always in being, or at least where the people have not reserved any part of the legislative to deputies, to be from time to time chosen by themselves.
